classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as pyrimidones. These are compounds that contain a pyrimidine ring, which bears a ketone. Pyrimidine is a 6-membered ring consisting of four carbon atoms and two nitrogen centers at the 1- and 3- ring positions.

category.category: Systemic Hormonal Preparations, Excl. Sex Hormones and Insulins

atc-code.level: SYSTEMIC HORMONAL PREPARATIONS, EXCL. SEX HORMONES AND INSULINS
